com.esri.mo2.map.elt
Class LegendElement

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.esri.mo2.map.elt.BaseElement
        |
        +--com.esri.mo2.map.elt.LegendElement
All Implemented Interfaces:
Cloneable, Data, Element, Identifiable, MapData, Spatial
public class LegendElement
extends BaseElement

A generic implementation for Legend element. A LegendElement, like other elements in the package, can be drawn on the any element container. When a NorthArrowElement is added to an element container programmatically (that is, not through container's UI such as layout tool in PageLayout), an associated Map object must be set, otherwise it can't be serialized.
